translation: With firm faith in Śrī Gaura Dhāma (the abode of Śrī Gaura) he is very dear to Śrīla Bhakti Rakṣak Śrīdhar Dev-Goswāmī Mahārāj, and is the best of preceptors. He is full of intense loving attachment to the service of Govinda (Lord Śrī Govinda and Śrīla Bhakti Sundar Govinda Dev-Goswāmī Mahārāj... Govinda, Govinda!) I eternally and repeatedly bow down to Śrīla Bhakti Rañjan Madhusūdan Mahārāj.
*gaura-dhāma-niṣṭhaṁ* — one who has firm faith in the abode of Srī Gaura;\
*govindānuraktaṁ* — one who has anuraga, intense loving attachment, for Śrīla Bhakti Sundar Govinda or Lord Śrī Govinda;\
*namami nityam śrī madhusūdanaṁ—śrī bhakti rañjanam* — eternally bow down to Śrī Bhakti Rañjanam Madhusūdanam Mahārāj.
